评论详情: Nice quality and looked like the Amazon website picture!
I waited to review until I had washed the sweater. It's girlie and cute and held up in the washing machine. That's a win.
Bought for a 60s themed Work party. Looked fabulous with my plaid pants.

I wear this sweater with my large elephant bell bottom jeans and it looks adorable! So retro! It’s lighter than what I expected. The quality is in line with the price. Not bad, but not amazing, that’s why the 4 stars. If I could give 4.5, I would.
Beautiful and beautiful fitting this is my favorite item in the closet love it
I really wanted to like this sweater, but the quality just isn't good for the price. Not worth it to me.

Great to wear to work.  Sweater is thin- good for the 60 & 70 degree temps.  I did size up for extra breathing room (I carry weight in my gut).  Sweater is super cute and I got several compliments on it.  It’s nice and unique without being weird.
Seems like good quality, but can’t wear because it runs so small
It is fitted I am 5 “6” and 140 lbs if u want it less tight get the M. Color is a bright orange
My gf loves their designs but their smallest size is a US size 6 and she's a size 4. Returning soon
Perfect fit. Very retro. Soft. Love it.
True to size and so cute!
